com.mindfusion.drawing

Interface Region


  • public interface Region
    Describes the interior of a graphics shape composed of rectangles and paths.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Releases all resources used by this region.
      void exclude(Rectangle rect)
      Updates this Region to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified Rectangle object.
      void exclude(Region region)
      Updates this Region to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified Region object.
      void intersect(Region region)
      Updates this Region to the intersection of itself with the specified region.
      void makeInfinite()
      Updates this Region to an infinite region.

    • Method Detail

      • exclude

        void exclude(Rectangle rect)
        Description copied from interface: Region
        Updates this Region to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified Rectangle object.
        Parameters:
        rect - The Rectangle structure to exclude from this region.

      • exclude

        void exclude(Region region)
        Description copied from interface: Region
        Updates this Region to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified Region object.
        Parameters:
        region - The Region to exclude from this region.

      • intersect

        void intersect(Region region)
        Description copied from interface: Region
        Updates this Region to the intersection of itself with the specified region.
        Parameters:
        region - The Region to intersect with this region.

      • makeInfinite

        void makeInfinite()
        Description copied from interface: Region
        Updates this Region to an infinite region.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Description copied from interface: Region
        Releases all resources used by this region.
